Why do we use it? It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters Notifications & Security Notifications Market Variation We will send you notifications when there is a market variation on RTC Lending Updates We will send you notifications when there is an update in your lendings Security Biometrics Use biometrics to confirm your payments and transactions
KYC Verification Now, let‚Äôs authenticate your account to ensure safe transactions Do it later Do it now You need to grant storage permission to upload documents
eKYC Verification Step 1 Select Document Let\'s verify your identity using a government released document DOCUMENT TYPE Step 2 Enter details Fill up the details of the document select us for to verify FULL NAME DOCUMENT NUMBER DATE OF BIRTH EXP DATE ISSUE DATE Step 3 Step 4 Upload document Upload video Finally, Upload a photo of the mentioned \ndocument Finally, Record a video recording of your face. (Please record video maximum of 15 Seconds and with front, left and right looking face) Reupload Submit Re Submit Error: Document verification unsuccessful. Uploaded document didn‚Äôt match with the document type selected above. Error: Invalid date of birth entered You need to grant permissions to capture video

Finish Please enter the registered email ID and we will send you an OTP to that mail. Payment successful Loan ID: Lent to: Monthly installment: Loan amount: Interest rate: Loan term: Pay back: Collateral: Date & Time: With Collateral With Nagra, you can take back control of your finances. Headquartered in Oslo, Nagra a building a new financial tribe of people and businesses in 150 countries. Nagra has developed a unique, Layer 1, Proof of Authority blockchain as well as the world‚Äôs first Web3 financial ecosystem. \n\nNagra‚Äôs goal is by 2025 for 100,000,000 people and enterprises to be financially free and do more with money by sending, receiving, withdrawing, depositing, borrowing, lending, earning, swapping, interacting, and transacting on the Metaverses and in the real world. \n\nFor further information, visit www.nagra.com.
